    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Application
     
    BnBStrategy
    The BnBStrategy class implements the SolvingStrategy interface and solves the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using the Branch and Bound (BnB) algorithm.
    BranchAndBound
    The BranchAndBound class implements a branch and bound algorithm to solve the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP).
    CompleteGraph
    The CompleteGraph class represents a complete directed graph.
    Controller
     
    Courier
    The Courier class represents a courier with an associated ID.
    DeliveryRequest
    The DeliveryRequest class represents a delivery request, which includes a delivery address and an assigned courier.
    DeliveryTour
    The DeliveryTour class represents a delivery tour for a courier.
    Graph
     
    Intersection
    The Intersection class represents an intersection with a unique ID, latitude, and longitude.
    Plan
    The Plan class is responsible for reading and processing a city plan in XML format, which consists of intersections and sections between them.
    Round
    The Round class represents a round of deliveries managed by a fleet of couriers.
    runBnB
     
    Section
    The Section class represents a road section between two intersections.
    SeqIter
    The SeqIter class implements an Iterator for traversing the set of unvisited vertices that are successors of a given current vertex in a graph.
    Solver
    The Solver class is responsible for solving a Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) based on a plan of intersections and sections.
    SolvingStrategy
    The SolvingStrategy interface defines the contract for strategies that solve the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP).
    TemplateTSP
    The TemplateTSP class provides an abstract template for solving the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using a branch and bound algorithm.
    TSP
     
    TSP1
    The TSP1 class extends the TemplateTSP class and provides a concrete implementation of the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) solver using a trivial bound and a basic iterator for unvisited vertices.
    TspStrategy
    The TspStrategy class implements the SolvingStrategy interface and solves the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using a TSP solver.
